title: Virtual Patient Design Process for Dental Education Based on the 4C/ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic dental procedures and familiarity with clinical terminology
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive programs in mobile learning environments using personal devices (BYOD), requiring interactive learner engagement and real-time feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can perform multiple dental treatment scenarios (e.g., cavity treatment, periodontal care, emergency care) step-by-step through virtual patient simulations.
Learners can establish diagnostic and treatment plans with over 80% accuracy after performing learning tasks in the 4C/ID model.
Learners can reduce clinical judgment errors by over 30% based on feedback acquired through virtual patient interactions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
